Question: HE01_01_r
Description: Visiting an art exhibition would be quite boring for me.

Question: HE01_12_r
Description: If I knew I'd never get caught, I'd be ready to steal a million.

Description: Sometimes others tell me that I am too stubborn.

Question: HE01_20_r

Question: HE01_21_r
Description: Others think I am irascible.

Question: HE01_24_r
Description: I think I deserve more respect than the average person.

Description: I think I'm not popular.

Question: HE01_32_r

Description: Most people are more crazy and dynamic than I am in general.

Question: HE01_49_r
Description: I do not consider myself an artistic or creative person.

Description: Sometimes I have the impression that I am worthless.

Description: I wouldn't panic even in an emergency.

Description: I find it boring to discuss philosophy.

Question: HE01_57_r

Question: HE01_60_r

Description: I rarely feel angry, not even at people who treated me very unfairly.

Description: In general, I'm pretty happy with myself.

Question: HE01_05
Description: I would be afraid if I had to travel in bad weather conditions.

Question: HE01_08
Description: I often push myself very hard when trying to achieve a goal.

Question: HE01_16

Question: HE01_17
Description: When I am suffering from a painful experience, I need someone to comfort me.

Question: HE01_18
Description: Having a lot of money is not particularly important to me.

Question: HE01_22
Description: Most days I am happy and optimistic.

Question: HE01_23
Description: I could cry when I see other people crying.

Question: HE01_25
Description: If I had the opportunity, I would like to attend a classical music concert.

Question: HE01_27
Description: My attitude towards people who have treated me badly is "forgiven and forgotten".

Question: HE01_29
Description: When it comes to physical dangers, I am very fearful.

Question: HE01_33

Question: HE01_34
Description: In social situations, I'm usually the one who takes the first step.

Question: HE01_36
Description: I would never take a bribe, even if it was a lot.

Question: HE01_37
Description: I've been told many times that I have a good imagination.

Question: HE01_38

Question: HE01_39

Question: HE01_40
Description: The first thing I do in a new place is to make friends.

Question: HE01_43

Question: HE01_45
